title: Develop Games with Panda3D and Python
summary: In the brief amount of time available, this tutorial will take a simple game concept and implement a multi-player game. Game development with Panda3D will consist of writing a Python program that controls the Panda3D library. Computer lab projects will provide hands-on experience investigating the various components of a network game.
